Class TeacherQuestionController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherQuestionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TeacherQuestionController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for handling the question management interface for teachers. This class is responsible for managing the UI interactions for question management. author Wong Cheuk Yuen

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller class.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
      resources - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized

    • loadQuestionsFromDatabase

      public void loadQuestionsFromDatabase()
      Loads questions from the database and populates the TableView.

    • handleReset

      public void handleReset()
      Handles the reset action. Clears the input fields.

    • handleFilter

      public void handleFilter()
      Handles the filter action. Filters the questions based on the input fields.

    • handleUpdate

      public void handleUpdate()
      Handles the update action. Updates the selected question with the input fields.

    • handleRefresh

      public void handleRefresh()
      Handles the refresh action. Reloads the questions from the database.

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      Handles the add action. Adds a new question to the database.

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete()
      Handles the delete action. Deletes the selected question from the database.
